title: PBE.
body: Just to ask, when am i going to be accepted into the pbe, 2-3 years i submitted request and still nothing.Riot if you read this please add me into it !

replies.body: Asking for an account won't get you one. Of you haven't been accepted there are a few probable reasons why, I suggest checking the requirements. If you meet all of these requirements I suggest sending a formal email asking why you haven't been accepted. There are also problems with pbe sign ups atm, so your status may not be truly represented. Hang tight!

I double checked your account, and we did get your application when you applied last year. Applying doesn't immediately get you onto the pbe servers, since we want to bring people who are able to test what we plan on changing. You can check out all the different things we check for when sending out invites on our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).
